value:
$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|Information crucial to those fated to
have Embla's blood coursing through
their veins... It must be here!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_SpringFes19,Face|Is it? I don't see how it could be...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリカ,ch08_11_Marica_F_SpringFes19,Face|I have joined my heart with this
pegasus! I can fly!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭パオラ,ch01_18_Paora_F_SpringFes19,Face|That's the way! Let's go!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_SpringFes19,Face|Spring is here, my dear, and so are
you. Shall we?$k$p$Sbs150|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_春祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_SpringFes19,Face|Bruno... Did you find it?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|Not yet...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_SpringFes19,Face|Don't get your hopes up. You can't
trust Loki...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|This is it—this is it!$k$pA treatise on the taguel, a race from
another realm... This is precisely
what I sought!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_SpringFes19,Face|Really?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_SpringFes19,Face|Told you! I remember exactly what I
said, dear. "There's got to be a clue
at the spring festival."$k$pSee? All I want is to make dear, sweet
Veronica happy!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_SpringFes19,Face|I don't believe you.$k$pBut you helped Bruno, and that does
make me happy...$k$pEven if this outfit is very strange.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_SpringFes19,Face|Prince? About the next clue...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_SpringFes19,Face|Next clue?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_SpringFes19,Face|Hee-hee. I can't wait to see where
it'll turn up! Can you?$k$p$Sbs150|
